The '''Mound of the Riders''' was a burial mound raised for the [[Rohirrim]] who fell in the [[Battles of the Fords of Isen]]. It was raised on a bare eyot in the middle of the fords, ringed with stones and set about with spears.<ref>{{TT|III8}}</ref>

==History==
The [[First Battle of the Fords of Isen|First]] and [[Second Battle of the Fords of Isen|Second]] Battles of the Fords happened on [[25 February]] and [[2 March]] {{TA|3019}} respectively. The Rohirrim took heavy losses. Later, [[Gandalf]] gathered all surviving forces he could find. He set some to make the Mound and later to return to protect [[Edoras]].
